note: Hi, I'm Sabrina, a level 45 lumberjane sapphic trans woman neurodiverse gamer Twitch affiliate who mostly plays Escape from Tarkov and Spoopy Survival Horror Stuff. I also am a motorhead gearhead blackthumb mechanic girl who likes to go off roading, auto racing, and rebuilding cars in my spare time which I sometimes film and put up on YouTube. This is my Content-Creation focused account so I can keep my promo stuff separate from "real world" stuff and to make it easy for you to engage or disengage as your preference dictates.
